The image was shared on Facebook with th: 2. The image was actually several years old and was not taken in Jerusalem. It was previously shared on Reddit claiming to show the sky over Zacatecas, Mexico.
The building on the far right: hand side of the photograph is St. Peter's Basilica in Vatican City, not a building in Jerusalem.
The image is an example of pareidolia: a psychological phenomenon where the mind detects familiar patterns in random stimuli.
